action.name: CHECK_OUT_FROM_RRU_INBOX
action.historyText: Request checked-out for dispatch by RRU assistant (field(currentUser))

action.name: REMIND_DPPO
action.historyText: A reminder email has been sent to the DPPO Administrative Assistant.

action.name: SEND_BACK_FOR_REVISION
action.confirmationText: Send request back to field(createdBy) for revision ?
action.historyText: Document sent back for Revision to (field(createdBy))

action.name: ASSIGN
action.historyText: Request assigned to Certifying Officer (field(CertifyingOfficer,FirstCertifyingOfficer)) by field(currentUser).

action.name: SEND_TO_DPPO
action.confirmationText: Send shipment authorization request to DPPO ?

action.name: CHECK_OUT
action.confirmationText: Check out this request from the RRU Inbox?
action.historyText: Checked out from RRU Inbox by field(currentUser)

action.name: SEND_BACK_FOR_REVISION
action.confirmationText: Send request back to Creator (field(createdBy) for revision ?
action.historyText: Document sent back for Revision to (field(createdBy))

action.historyText: Document sent back for Revision to field(createdBy)

action.confirmationText: Send shipment authorization request to the Certifier field(CertifyingOfficer,FirstCertifyingOfficer) ?

action.name: APPROVE_CERTIFIED
action.confirmationText: This request does not need certification by DPPO. Confirm ?
action.historyText: Approved (Dispatch Authorized) and sent to RRU for dispatch.

action.name: APPROVE_URGENT
action.confirmationText: High Priority Request: Approve and forward request to DPPO ?
action.historyText: Approved and sent to DPPO by field(currentUser).

action.name: PULL_BACK_REQUEST
action.confirmationText: Pull back request and send it to the requestor's inbox ?
action.historyText: Pulled back and sent to the requestor's inbox by field(currentUser).

action.name: SEND_BACK_FOR_REVISION
action.confirmationText: Send request back to Creator field(createdBy) for revision ?
action.historyText: Document sent back for Revision to field(createdBy)

action.name: USE_ONE_ACCOUNT
action.confirmationText: Confirmation: This shipment will be charged from one account. Continue ?

action.name: USE_TWO_ACCOUNTS
action.confirmationText: Confirmation: This shipment will be charged from two accounts. Continue ?

action.name: ADD_PACKAGE_DETAILS
action.confirmationText: Send document for addition of weight and cost details ?

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Dear field(Supervisor)
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Please review and approve the following shipment authorization request.
Link : Link() Time Stamp : DateTime()
Regards,
User().

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : Request for Additional Details (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Dear field(DistributionUnitAssistant),
Please add the required details for the following shipment authorization request.
Time Stamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser).

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : For Dispatch (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
All,
Please note that the following package authorization has been sent to RRU. Dispatch has been authorized, and the request does not need certification.
OBMO : field(ObligationDocumentId) Time Stamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser).

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : Approval Notification. (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Dear field(createdBy),
Your request for shipment authorization has been approved and forwarded to RRU for processing. Kindly deliver the items to the RRU mail room. Packages should be packed, properly addressed and marked with the authorization reference code for speedy processing. Please note that the OBMO and BAC will be forwarded to the respective Certifying Officer for certification before packages are dispatched.
Time Stamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser)

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : New Request (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
All,
Please note that the following request for shipment authorization has been approved and forwarded to the RRU Inbox.
Time Stamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser)

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : Sent to DPPO (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Kindly process the following request for shipment authorization.
Time Stamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser).

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : New Request (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
All,
Please note that the following request for shipment authorization has been approved and forwarded to DPPO for certification.
Time Stamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser).

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : field(Reference)
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
The following request has been taken out of the supervisor's inbox and sent back to the staff member. This is because the supervisor was unavailable. The requestor can now select an alternate supervisor and send the document for approval.
Remarks : Comments() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser).

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : Sent back for Revision (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Dear field(createdBy),
This following request for shipment authorization has been sent back to you for revision.
Remarks : Comments() Datestamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser).

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : Request for Certification (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Dear field(CertifyingOfficer,FirstCertifyingOfficer),
Please certify the following shipment authorization request.
Est. Amount(USD) : field(EstimatedCost) Time Stamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser).

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : Sent to DPPO. (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Dear field(createdBy),
Your request for shipment authorization has been reviewed by RRU and sent to DPPO for certification. Once certified, the package can then be dispatched.
Time Stamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser)

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : Certified (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
All,
Please note that the following package authorization has been certified.
Time Stamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser)

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : For 2nd Certification (field(SecondCertifyingOfficer))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Dear field(SecondCertifyingOfficer),
Please note that the first account on this request has been certified. Kindly certify the second.
Time Stamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser)

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : Follow up (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
The following request for shipment authorization has been sent to DPPO, but has not yet been certified. Please request the certifier to process it as soon as possible.
Time Stamp : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser)

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : Declined (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Dear field(Reference),
Please note that your request for shipment has been declined.
Remarks : Comments() Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser)

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Shipment Authorization : Dispatch Notification. (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Dear emailField(createdBy),
Please note that your package has been dispatched.
Link : Link()
Regards,
field(currentUser)

group.title: Authorizations
group.visible: In(User(), role(SharedInboxUsers)) #or# In(User(), role(DPPOAdministrativeAssistant)) #or# In(User(), role(Certifiers))
